Author: NotFomo
Title: [ANN][ICO]🔵CrowdCoinage🔵Decentralized Crowdfunding Platform for ICO Campaigns
Body: The token itself is of a minor practical use and would not hold its value for long if it does not have any functionality required to interact with other applications or other tokens via the Ethereum blockchain. The methods that need to be implemented are for example related to transfers, a total supply and a balance on an address. The standard was developed to ensure that these basic interaction methods would be duly implemented. The advantage of Ethereum is that all well-known exchanges are accepting these types of tokens allowing the support for custom tokens to be implemented in our platform.

Author: irentys
Title: [ANN][ICO]🔵CrowdCoinage🔵Decentralized Crowdfunding Platform for ICO Campaigns
Body: Why a token contract is needed on Ethereum?

Author: NotFomo
Title: [ANN][ICO]🔵CrowdCoinage🔵Decentralized Crowdfunding Platform for ICO Campaigns
Body: A token contract is basically a map of Ethereum account addresses and their balances. The balance can be called token. The contract describes the logic needed to ensure that the balances always match the actions that have been completed by token owners. The methods include for example querying the total number of tokens or defining how to send tokens from one address to another.

Author: AndyFallek
Title: [ANN][ICO]🔵CrowdCoinage🔵Decentralized Crowdfunding Platform for ICO Campaigns
Body: Community & investors decide. Community has an important part in the cryptocurrency/blockchain world and CrowdCoinage would like to continue that tradition. All projects that have been submitted for their ICOs using the CrowdCoinage platform must first and foremost achieve the community’s trust and approval. All projects must build their community of supporters like any other project that would launch an ICO outside of the CrowdCoinage platform. All community members can express their support by casting a vote into the blockchain and when the project has received enough votes it can move on to the next phase – the token sale. After the project has received community’s support and positive feedback, it will be more probable that they will conduct a successful token sale and raise a lot of cryptofunds. After the token sale project has automatically received funds needed for the first milestone on their roadmap, the rest of the amount raised will be held by a smart contract until the project will be ready for the next milestone. Investors can vote to decide whether the project’s team has fulfilled their promises and on the positive vote, funds will be released for the next milestone.

CrowdCoinage ICO platform will be almost entirely built on top of the blockchain, only the very necessary servers or services will be used outside of the blockchain. For example, personal data will be kept separated so that users can ask for its complete deletion. It will be required by the upcoming GDPR regulation and by media and communication. Other than that, all the functions, votes and transactions on the CrowdCoinage ICO platform will be set up in decentralized way. Frontend is going to consist of web and mobile apps with a simple UI that interacts with the blockchain via lightweight API.

Body: For CrowdCoinage BETA version we have the following list of developments: 1) Integration with blockchain CrowdCoinage OS will be running on top of Ethereum blockchain. We chose Ethereum because it suits best our platform needs and we really love the huge and helpful community behind it. 2) Smart contracts with voting tokens Voting rights for investors, to let them be in control of their investments by releasing funds for next milestones startups are facing. We believe that through this feature ICO campaigns can gain more trust and popularity. 3) Listing in two crypto exchanges We are currently in talks with many exchanges. HitBTC will be our first target, as the negotiations have already started.  Quote from: seriosman on January 09, 2018, 02:08:55 PM For what purposes will public API of CrowdCoinage system be used?  CrowdCoinage Public API enables powerful features for our platform users.  1) Public API for marketplace data and ICO campaigns to support PR and marketing. Example: Showing the campaign status information like token sale and campaign deadline is a good incentive for potential investors and makes the experience more interactive. The user can integrate all that and much more into their third-party website or application. 2) Integrating all major tools of productivity into our ecosystem. Example: when a campaign has multiple parties related to it, then it will be easier to maintain it through a Slack channel and have their to-do lists at Trello for improved productivity. 3) Possibility to offer payment solutions Example: we believe that our clients would love the possibility to offer payment solutions that are based on cryptocurrencies to their clients. The CrowdCoinage OS payment API will be offering the functionality similar to PayPal's shopping cart.  Quote from: hollybit on January 09, 2018, 02:25:09 PM When does the company plan to launch Marketplace and what goods will be sold on this platform?  Marketplace is planned to be launched in the fourth quarter of 2018 as stated in our Roadmap.  Vision is to create a decentralized borderless marketplace for all kinds of financial services and products where anyone from anywhere can be either a service provider or a consumer of these products and services.  Moving further, we are aiming to develop tools and instruments for market analysis and investments.  Think of Amazon, eBay and the likes, only that it's going to be better.  Best regards, Silver

Title: [ANN][ICO]🔵CrowdCoinage🔵Decentralized Crowdfunding Platform for ICO Campaigns
Body: Hi MainIbem, thanks for your feedback. I understand that this is the most important question that many of the community members want me to answer. I actually answered this question in this conversation yesterday.  Its true that our hard cap seems to be high but there is much more to it to build a modern all-in-one financial platform like the CrowdCoinage OS than just the development process. We have to apply for at least five different licenses and permissions in order to offer the services that have been promised on our roadmap. These are not cheap and many of them require us to hire a certain quantity of qualified staff or people with special skills and knowledge. We also cannot forget the marketing and PR bills that need to be paid when we start expanding our services for example to Asia were ICO-s have been banned by many countries.   Currently we are working hard on our first beta/prototype version that includes the crowdfunding, ICO campaigns and escrow functionality and it will be launched very soon.  The roadmap is an indication of what will be developed when a certain amount has been met. We have agreed among the founders that we are going forward no matter how much funds would be raised. Even in the case of not meeting our hard cap during this ICO, we are going to deliver all the financially feasible milestones provided on the roadmap. It's important to bare in mind that 50% of all CCOS tokens will be sold during this ICO campaign. We've had great response from the community lately and when you guys believe in us and we get your trust and support we can launch another token sale to meet all the funding requirements needed for our further developments.  Thanks, Peep

Title: [ANN][ICO]🔵CrowdCoinage🔵Decentralized Crowdfunding Platform for ICO Campaigns
Body: Hi TimeTeller, thanks for your question. Its a good one and we will gladly answer it.  Its true that our hard cap seems to be high but there is much more to it to build a modern all-in-one financial platform like the CrowdCoinage OS than just the development process. We have to apply for at least five different licenses and permissions in order to offer the services that have been promised on our roadmap. These are not cheap and many of them require us to hire a certain quantity of qualified staff or people with special skills and knowledge. We also cannot forget the marketing and PR bills that need to be paid when we start expanding our services for example to Asia were ICO-s have been banned by many countries.   Currently we are working hard on our first beta/prototype version that includes the crowdfunding, ICO campaigns and escrow functionality and it will be launched very soon.  The roadmap is an indication of what will be developed when a certain amount has been met. We have agreed among the founders that we are going forward no matter how much funds would be raised. Even in the case of not meeting our hard cap during this ICO, we are going to deliver all the financially feasible milestones provided on the roadmap. It's important to bare in mind that 50% of all CCOS tokens will be sold during this ICO campaign. We've had great response from the community lately and when you guys believe in us and we get your trust and support we can launch another token sale to meet all the funding requirements needed for our further developments.  Wishing you all peaceful holidays Peep Paum CEO
